Player History
Earned first career win on 4/4/1985...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1985, off Teddy Higuera (CIN)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago to Los Angeles on 7/24/1985 (Going to LAD: P Rick Sutcliffe. Going to CHC: P Juan Guzman, P Darren Holmes, LF Devon White, SS Jose Vizcaino)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Toronto on 2/14/1986 (Going to LAD: P Juan Berenguer, P Ron Davis, C Ernie Whitt, 1B Fred McGriff, 3B Mike Bordick. Going to TOR: P Rick Sutcliffe, C Mike Scioscia)...
6/24/1987: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $1,350,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...
Injured on 8/24/1988 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/16/1989 with a Stiff Elbow, out for 2 weeks...
8/28/1989: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $720,000 per year, for 1 years.
Released by Toronto on 10/24/1989...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/16/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $950,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 5/26/1991 to a minor league deal...
